body_html: I'm also not very happy with stacking the scalars. We've discussed that in #7973, where @SsnL claimed that this was the behavior before his fix, so I passed on arguing further. However, if this wasn't the case in the previous release, then I do think we should raise an error if we see scalar outputs. @SsnL?
